overview: (Masoud) and (Keshta) pickpocket, before deciding to repent and start a new life amid the inhabitants of the tin hut, to surprise the residents of the estate Abu Shama, who aspires to seize their land to establish some of his projects, and offers them to leave each of their land for a small amount of money , To reject the inhabitants of the tin hut, and escalating events.
title: The Manor Of Tin
